full_threads.body: +45mins added to Harvest and closed.
@heath, please let me know how much time to record on this ticket.

Hi Lynette, 

Chris here jumping in on behalf of Heath. There are 2 ways we can update the notifications/confirmations. 

1. You can send us the particulars. Please include the messaging and intended recipients. 

2. You can perform the updates yourself. 
Editing admin notifications: https://scribehow.com/shared/Update_Email_Notification_in_Womens_Housing_Company__MXVP82d8SueZ9vJHS2TqvQ

I'm standing by if you need a hand.

Sorry, I should also ask, we need to set up the content of the receipts and notification emails.

Can you tell me where we start for this piece ?

Thanks,

Lynette
Thanks Heath !

Hi Lynette,

Thanks for sending these through. Confirming we have now made these updates.

Hi there,

The team have done a review; I've attached the latest updates.

Whilst the live payment went through, there was some information missing as identified in the document attached.

Please note: looking at this I've identified an urgent issue with the Donation portal. Can you please look at my note and advise ASAP.

Kind regards,

Lynette

Hi Lynette,

Yes sure, let me know how it goes.

Hi there,

I ran a test payment on the page, but I don't see it on the NAB back end. Normally it indicates there where a test payment comes through.

Are you OK for me to change the Mode to Production so that the transactions go through (though with a test credit card) ?

Thanks,

Lynette

Hi Lynette,

Yes, in theory we could do that. It's more a case of them (the user) not having full ownership of the process and receiving updates etc.

I would think that is they are able to pay on online (or have the desire to) they will likely understand the requirement for an email address. That's just my thoughts, but I'll be guided by your experience with these clients of course.

Thanks, this is looking great !

I have a question around the email address. Would it be possible to have, say, a tick box "I don't have an email address" and then have the email address default to contact@womenshousingcompany.org ? Obviously, I have no idea about what can be accommodated in Gravity forms 😊

I don't have this as an explicit question from the business just now, I'm just trying to think ahead.

Otherwise, I will provide the feedback as much as possible in one hit to make it easier for you to manage.

Kind regards,

Lynette

Cool, thanks Lynette.

Ok, confirming I have now:

  • Made the page publicly viewable
  • Coded in the Google Maps API to populate the address
  • Connected the NAB Transact test payment gateway and just done a test for $100.

You can test the payment gateway using these credentials:

Card number: 4444333322221111
Date: any future date
CVV: 123

Let me know how you go 🙂

Sorry, just a quick question.

I can only see this because I'm logged on. If I'm not I get a 404

Can you please sort that out so I can get the rest of the team to look at and eventually test.

Thanks!

Hi Heath,

Here's the credentials:

Live and Test Hosted Payment Page Implementation

- Merchant ID (or "vendor_name"): 8UV0010

Live Direct Post and API Implementation

- Merchant ID (or "EPS_MERCHANT"): 8UV0010

- Live Transaction Password: rLcWCt5s

Test Direct Post and API Implementation

- Merchant ID (or "EPS_MERCHANT"): 8UV0010

- Test Transaction Password: abc123

We don't use the 3D secure. There are some Risk Management settings, like a filter on the transactions, but I'm not sure that they'll affect you. An example would be not accepting things from overseas.

Let me know if you run into any problems.

Kind regards,

Lynette

Hi Lynette,

Great news, the form is ready for you to review:
https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/tenant-payments/

If you can please send through the NAB Transact details, we can hook it up to your account for some testing.

The details we require are:

  • NAB MerchantId
  • NAB Transaction Password
  • Please let us know if you have "3D Secure" or "Risk Management" enabled on the account as well

Please note, the email field needs to be a required field. If they don't have an email address, they can't use the form. This is a requirement of the integration I'm afraid.

Regarding the thank you message, we can load a anything you like, please advise.

Thanks!

Hi again,

I just wanted to check in and see how things are progressing and if there's anything you need from our end.

Thanks,

Lynette

Lynette Favelle

Business Systems Manager

Direct: 02 8202 9304 • Office Ph: 02 9281 1764 • Mob: 0401 293 912

http://www.womenshousingcompany.org/





The Women's Housing Company Limited is a Tier 1 not-for-profit community housing organisation providing social and affordable housing and homelessness services for women and children. This e-mail and any attachments are for the intended addressee only. If you are not the intended recipient for this email, please notify the sender by return email immediately and delete it from your system. Unauthorised use of this email is prohibited.
That's great, thanks !

Hi Lynette,

Apologies for the radio silence, we will be focusing on this early this week and get back to you with an update shortly.

Hi there,

I haven't heard back so I thought I'd better check in.

Do you have everything you need to go ahead with this page ? Please let me know if anything is outstanding.

Thanks,

Lynette

Hi Heath,

Apologies for the delay on this, I had a few hoops to deal with internally.

Can you please proceed on this.

Thanks,

Lynette

Lynette Favelle

Business Systems Manager

Direct: 02 8202 9304 • Office Ph: 02 9281 1764 • Mob: 0401 293 912

http://www.womenshousingcompany.org/





The Women's Housing Company Limited is a Tier 1 not-for-profit community housing organisation providing social and affordable housing and homelessness services for women and children. This e-mail and any attachments are for the intended addressee only. If you are not the intended recipient for this email, please notify the sender by return email immediately and delete it from your system. Unauthorised use of this email is prohibited.

full_threads.body: Just a friendly reminder that this ticket has been open for over 5 days. Please close it if it's resolved or follow up if necessary. Thanks so much!
Logged 30mins to Harvest
